#
# CMakeLists.txt generated by CLion for a Qt project and managed by CLion as well
#

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.28)
project(learning__qt_file_explorer)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTORCC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTOUIC ON)

find_package(Qt6 COMPONENTS
        Core
        Gui
        Widgets
        REQUIRED)

add_executable(learning__qt_file_explorer src/main.cc
        src/helpers.h
        src/helpers.cc
        src/directory_picker_widget.cc
        src/directory_picker_widget.h
        src/model.cc
        src/model.h
        src/directory_listing_widget.cc
        src/directory_listing_widget.h
        src/main_window.cc
        src/main_window.h
)
target_link_libraries(learning__qt_file_explorer
        Qt::Core
        Qt::Gui
        Qt::Widgets
)
